channel.title: Solutions
channel.description: We use research and evidence to tackle the biggest problems in society, from economic justice to cultural issues and more.
channel.author: Solutions Team
channel.itunes:author: Solutions Team
channel.itunes:subtitle: Solving the world's problems.
channel.itunes:summary: We use research and evidence to tackle the biggest problems in society, from economic justice to cultural issues and more.

item.title: Ending Homelessness
item.description: Grant and Elias tackle the United States homelessness epidemic, discussing Housing First policy, zoning laws, 3D printing, and various aspects of building and distributing affordable housing for all.
item.dc:creator: Solutions Team
item.itunes:summary: Grant and Elias tackle the United States homelessness epidemic, discussing Housing First policy, zoning laws, 3D printing, and various aspects of building and distributing affordable housing for all.
